column1: '''Jef Murray''' ([[17 March]] [[1960]] - [[3 August]] [[2015]]), employed by the Pitts Theology Library of [[Wikipedia:Emory University
column2: Emory University]] in Atlanta, has painted and sketched numerous [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column3: Tolkien]]-related images for publications such as the [[Amon Hen (journal)
column5: ''Mallorn'' journal]]. He has also had Tolkien-related work featured in the ''St. Austin Review'', a journal of Catholic culture.

column1: In 2009, Murray made the illustrations for [[Hilary Tolkien]]'s ''[[Black & White Ogre Country]]''.
*"[http://www.tolkienlibrary.com/press/1169-interview-with-the-wizard-jef-murray.php Interview with the Wizard Jef Murray]" at [[Tolkien Library]]
